A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Genuinely Bad. Space gravity wouldn't arc energy cannon blasts\, and the energy of said blast wouldn't dissipate over the vacuum of space. This makes the whole premise flawed to begin with. The Finn story is just god awful\, and managed to make a fancy star wars casino agrivating. Also\, the film seems to play politics a bit with the personification of corporate greed. Just unnecessary. Also the interaction between the Pink haired Lady\, Poe and PL was very dumb. \n\nSilver lining: coolest lightsaber battle ever. Ray/kylo are awesome together.
